attributes.action: consider scrapping or reducing charges in care homes for patients with dementia or alzheimers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are thousands of people in this country now suffering with Alzheimers and other forms of dementia.  I would request that the Prime Minister considers either scrapping or reducing the fees being paid by self-funded patients for their care.  It is a cruel disease for both the sufferer and the family which is exacerbated by huge care home fees and massive amounts of red tape needed to get the most basic benefits.
